scripts.set-venv: cd cmv_gateway/cmv_back && python3.13 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && cd ../../cmv_patients && python3.13 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && cd ../cmv_chambres && python3.13 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate
scripts.install-gateway: npm i && cd cmv_gateway/cmv_back && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../cmv_front && npm install
scripts.install-patients: cd cmv_patients && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install-chambres: cd cmv_chambres && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:app: npm i && npm run install-gateway && npm run install-patients && npm run install-chambres
scripts.start:preprod: docker network create cmv || true&& docker compose -f preprod-docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.start-patients: cd cmv_patients && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8002
scripts.start-chambres: cd cmv_chambres && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8003
scripts.start:dev: docker network create cmv || true && docker compose -f dev-docker-compose.yml up -d && concurrently "npm run start-gateway" "npm run start-patients" "npm run start-chambres"
